description: Aiko is a girl one year older than Shin`ichirou who attends a different school than him. She is going out with his friend Miyokichi Nobuse, but instead has feelings for Shin`ichirou. Aiko continuously tries to get closer with Shin`ichirou, such as asking him to go shopping with her instead of Miyokichi, and when out with Miyokichi she does not have the same vigour as when she is just with Shin`ichirou. Aiko has known Shin`ichirou since they were kids, and was introduced to Miyokichi through Shin`ichirou. She helps out at her family`s Imagawayaki shop named Imagawayaki Ai-chan. She is shorter than Shinichirou, and enjoys teasing him from time to time.
name: Andou Aiko
